environment.person Module

class environment.person.Person(person_id, types, start_edge, destination, sumo)

Bases: object

Person class representing a person in the simulation.

person_id

Unique identifier for the person.

Type:

str

start

Starting edge ID.

Type:

str

end

Destination edge ID.

Type:

str

sumo

SUMO simulation instance.

__init__(person_id, types, start_edge, destination, sumo) → None

Initializes a Person instance with the given parameters.

Parameters:

  • person_id (str) – Unique identifier for the person.

  • start (str) – Starting edge ID.

  • end (str) – Destination edge ID.

  • sumo – SUMO simulation instance.

get_destination()

Gets the destination edge ID of the person.

Returns:

Destination edge ID.

Return type:

str

get_road()

Gets the current road ID of the person.

Returns:

Current road ID.

Return type:

str

get_type()

Gets the dissability catagory of the person.

Returns:

Dissability catagory

Return type:

str

location()

Gets the current location of the person.

Returns:

Current position.

Return type:

str

remove_person()

Removes person from simulation
